tidbits.title: Vast Ice Sheet
tidbits.description: Greenland is home to the world's second-largest ice sheet, covering about 80% of the island and holding a significant portion of the world's freshwater.

tidbits.title: Inuit Culture
tidbits.description: The indigenous Inuit culture is integral to Greenland, with traditions, art, and a way of life deeply connected to the land, ice, and Arctic environment.

tidbits.title: Unique Natural Phenomena
tidbits.description: Greenland offers unique natural phenomena like the Northern Lights (Aurora Borealis) and the Midnight Sun, enchanting visitors with breathtaking displays.
